summary: This is a July 30, 2019 email from a Deputy United States Marshal regarding prisoner production for July 31, 2019, with attachments. It appears to be administrative communication about prisoner movement or custody arrangements.

persons.name: Deputy United States Marshal
persons.context: Sender of the email regarding prisoner production for July 31, 2019.

events.title: Prisoner Production
events.description: Scheduled prisoner production event referenced in the email subject line.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 30, 2019, regarding prisoner production scheduled for July 31, 2019.
It originates from a Deputy United States Marshal in the Southern District of New York.
The email includes attachments: TEXT.htm, MCC.PDF, and MDC.PDF, which may contain additional details about the prisoner production.
The timing (July 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death in August 2019, suggesting this may relate to his custody or movement.
